name: GAVI, THE VACCINE ALLIANCE
description: GAVI funds and provides access to new and underused vaccines for vulnerable children.
sampleDescriptions: Seek appropriations for the US contribution to GAVI, the Vaccine Alliance.
Advocate for GAVI and Global Health funding in House and Senate State, Foreign Operations bills
Advocate for GAVI and Global Health funding in House (HR 8771) and Senate State, FY 2025 State, Foreign Operations Appropriations bills.
Advocate for legislation concerning global health funding and vaccine policy
Advocate for GAVI and Global Health funding in House (HR 8771) and Senate State, FY 2025 State, Foreign Operations Appropriations bills.
